Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires written notice of the collection of a tax levy to be provided by registered or certified mail
Summary: Requires written notice of the collection of a tax levy to be provided by registered or certified mail.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to requiring written notice of the collection of a tax levy to be provided by registered or certified mail
